description.narrative: Zahra Call Center project is a human rights project aimed to improve women and girls situations through improving the level of understanding and applying of human rights and use the principle of WE ARE BORN EQUALE in addition to presence of positive cha nges towards women rights and equality in Basic schools and Youth centers. Presence of source of knowldeges and information as the call center with deal with this problems even if the citizen illetirate as in Upper EgyptZahra Call Center aims to empower wo men girls and male youth to work towarding improve the women situations through applying human rights and equality principles through implementing list of activities used as intery point for positive changes in Upper Egypt societies.Zahra Call Center proje ct deals with individual citizens CBOs Schools and Youth centers to strengthes the tools of awarness building and to advocates in-equality and women descrimenation. Also the project use CEDAWConvention on the Elimination of Discrimination Against Women as a source of information and messages that used in radio station- SMS.messages which can support strongly to find out positive changes.
